edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.nodeconfig

Interface GNSInterfaceNodeConfig<NodeIDType>

  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIDType -
    All Superinterfaces:
    edu.umass.cs.nio.interfaces.NodeConfig<NodeIDType>, edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ReconfigurableNodeConfig<NodeIDType>, edu.umass.cs.nio.interfaces.Stringifiable<NodeIDType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GNSConsistentNodeConfig, GNSConsistentReconfigurableNodeConfig, GNSNodeConfig, LNSConsistentNodeConfig, LNSConsistentReconfigurableNodeConfig, LNSNodeConfig

    public interface GNSInterfaceNodeConfig<NodeIDType>
extends edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ReconfigurableNodeConfig<NodeIDType>
    An interface to translate from integer IDs to socket addresses.
